Showing a menu

To display a menu, use the show menu script command.

First, you need to create a string list of options - see Using Lists. Then call the "show menu" command to display the list to the user and run a nested script after the user has made their selection.

Here is an example how to create a menu: First fill a new list with the entries 'female' and 'male'. If the player chooses an entry from the menu the variables playername and gender are set.

You can find another example here: Using Lists and Character Creation
